Description: Green glazed composition shabti of Hapmen born of Tentamen with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard, parallel hands in relief holding a hoe, an adze and the string of the incised seed-basket which hangs over the shoulder, there is a row of incised hieroglyphs inscribed around the waist and a similarly inscribed column running down the front of the leg section; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the feet.
